meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Neal Shah Jennifer Spirko Sean Kram Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6698.

td.p: Neal Shah, an attorney from Atlanta, Georgia
Jennifer Spirko, a public librarian from Maryville, Tennessee
Sean Kram, a barista from Edmonds, Washington (whose 1-day cash winnings total $28,401)

tr.td: A PASSAGE TO INDIANA
GARDENING
SUPER BOWL-WINNING COACHES
HOMONYMS
LET'S TWIST AGAIN
LIKE WE DID LAST SUMMER

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In a layout resembling that of Washington, D.C., streets converge on Monument Circle in the center of this capital city')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: In a layout resembling that of Washington, D.C., streets converge on Monument Circle in the center of this capital city

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Sean
Jennifer
Neal
SUE GRAFTON TEACHES THE ALPHABET
A "MAD" CATEGORY
THE LAW
THEIR BIBLICAL MAMAS
CULTURE AROUND THE WORLD

td.a: THE NEW YORK TIMES MOVIE REVIEWS

tr.td: (Alex: And all of the clues will be given by the New York Times movie critic A.O. Scott.)
